abstract: The investor Carl C. Icahn has gone shopping again, this time acquiring shares in the retailer J.C. Penney, according to press reports. While the exact size of his stake in the retailer is unknown, The Wall Street Journal said that Penney is now among Mr. Icahn’s five largest holdings, which could place it in the hundreds of millions of dollars.
lead_paragraph: The investor Carl C. Icahn has gone shopping again, this time acquiring shares in the retailer J.C. Penney, according to press reports. While the exact size of his stake in the retailer is unknown, The Wall Street Journal said that Penney is now among Mr. Icahn’s five largest holdings, which could place it in the hundreds of millions of dollars.

headline.main: Icahn Is Said to Buy Stake in Penney
